official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to abolish the Postal Rate Commission, to provide that the rates of postage, fees for postal services, and mail classifications shall be established by law, and for other purposes.
short_title: Postal Rate and Mail Classification Act

summary.text: Postal Rate and Mail Classification Act - Abolishes the Postal Rate Commission. Provides for the establishment of postal rates and fees by law in such amounts that revenues will equal expenses incurred under honest, efficient, and economical management. States that postal rates now in effect shall remain in effect until modified or terminated by law.
